name: Pareidolia (InkAndAmaranth, Wylli)
description:
Play as Haviera, troubled constantly by the things you see. They go wherever you go, forming creatures out of normal objects. Track down your demons and see what they really look like. It’s the only way to recover.

Wylli - Programming & Game Design

Eloise Unerman (InkAndAmaranth) - Pixel Art & Narrative Design

Nick Brake - Composition & Sound Design

Backgrounds are free to use stock assets, not created for this jam.
